summary: A standalone and simple Follower Mod
descriptionHtml:
This follower is standalone and based on my darkelf preset - Glacies.

[b]Location: [/b]

Found in the Grave Concoctions of Falkreath (console command "coc falkreathgraveconcoctions" to teleport to the place)


[b]Combat:[/b]

- very skilled with frost and shock spells but has no clue about fire 
- won't use shouts, can use staves
- comes with no armor and weapon (just fine clothes so he isn't naked)
- Lightfoot perk, some perks for destruction, if it's too OP, please let me know!
- levels with you
- essential, unique


[b]Misc.:[/b]

- can be married
- can be a steward (he should meet the requirements because of voicetype and being a follower, I can be wrong)
- voice is MaleEvenToned


[b]Armors I used for the screenshots: [/b](pics from left to right)

Ashara Princes of the Woods (SydneyB)
Executioner Armor from the Bloodborne Pack by Team Tal
Basic Robes - Male Replacers by RefurbMadness


I wish you good hunting with him!



[b]Credits [/b]

author: Thrwomp
